text.fr: (1.0) Numero(s) d'identification de la citerne routière

text.en: (2.0) Does the identification plate have all the required information and is legible?
text.fr: (2.0) La plaque d'identification a-t-elle toutes les informations requises et est-elle lisible?

text.en: (3.0) Were the filling limit requirements complied with?
text.fr: (3.0) Est-ce que les exigences de limites de remplissage sont en conformité?

text.en: (4.0) Was the tank tested and inspected in accordance with B620?
text.fr: (4.0) La citerne a-t-elle été testée et inspectée conformément à B620?

text.en: (4.1) Does the tank have displayed the appropriate inspection and test markings?
text.fr: (4.1) Est-ce que la citerne affiche les marquages d'examens et essais appropriés?

text.en: (5.0) Were hose assemblies included as part of your inspection?
text.fr: (5.0) Les flexibles ont-ils été inclus dans le cadre de votre inspection?

text.en: (5.01) Were hose assemblies inspected in accordance with B620?
text.fr: (5.01) Les flexibles ont-ils été inspectés conformément à B620?

text.en: (5.02) Does the hose assembly have the appropriate test markings, ID number and HAWP?
(5.03) Does the hose assembly have a minimum working pressure of 350psi?
(6.0) Are the supports and anchors in compliance with the requirements?
text.fr: (6.0) Est-ce que les supports et ancrages sont en conformité avec les exigences?

text.en: (7.0) Do the shell or head of the tank display any of the rejection criteria listed in c. 7.2.1.8 of B620?
text.fr: (7.0) Est-ce que les virole et fonds de la citèrne présentent des critères de rejet énumérées dans l'a 7.2.1.8 de la B620?

text.en: (8.0) Is the circumferential reinforcement in compliance with the requirements of B620?
text.fr: (8.0) 5.03 Est-ce que les renforcements structurels sont en conformité avec les exigences de la B620?

text.en: (9.0) Are the pipes, valves, safety devices, fittings, and other accessories that contain lading designed and protected from potential damage?
(10.0) Does the highway tank have sufficient road clearance?
(11.0) Does the tank have the appropriate emergency shut-off devices?
(12.0) Does the tank have the appropriate emergency discharge controls?
(12.1) Does the operator have the required emergency discharge control procedures? (c. 5.2.6 B622)
(12.2) Is the off-truck emergency shutdown system tested and is the report retained in accordance with B622 and B620?
(13.0) Does the rear-end protection of the tank meet the requirements of B620? (c. 5.1.5 B620)
(14.0) Do the manhole closures, pressure relief devices and roll over protection meet the requirements of B620? (c. 5.2.2.8, 5.2.4, 5.2.7 B620)
(15.0) Were loading and unloading operations observed as part of your inspection?
(15.1) Was the MOC and hose assembly pre-loading inspection done by the shipper or carrier? (c. 5.2 B622)
(15.2) Was the fail-safe brake interlock system or wheel chocks used? (c. 5.1(g) B622)
(15.3) Was the tank equipped with the appropriate emergency discharge controls? (c. 5.2.6, 5.5.1 B622)
(15.4) Were the loading and unloading operations supervised? (c. 5.3.1.1, 5.6 B622)
(15.5) After loading and unloading were all hatches, valves and other openings closed and secured? (c. 5.4, 5.7 B622)
(16.0) Is the highway tank equipped with the appropriate fire extinguisher? (c. 5.1h B622)
(17.0) Is the highway tank equipped with an automatic engine intake shut off device? (c. 5.1i B622)
(18.0) Were any other non-compliances with B620 or B622 observed on this highway tank?
